summary: Frontend testing completed for SoundMirror articulation visualization app. All core features are working correctly.

issues: Animation is very fast at default 0.5x speed - may be difficult for users to see individual frames clearly

critical_code_review_comments: ESLint warning in App.js line 852: useEffect has missing dependency 'phonemes' - consider extracting phonemes.join(',') to a separate variable
App.js is a large file (~1500+ lines) - consider splitting into separate component files for better maintainability
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features tested and working: (1) Letter Practice page loads with alphabet grid and animated heads, (2) Play Sound button triggers animation, (3) Animation frames advance visibly (F counter changes from F5 to phoneme-specific frames), (4) Animation completes and returns to neutral state F5, (5) Word Practice shows correct phoneme badges with digraph handling (hello=H,E,LL,O; ship=SH,I,P; think=TH,I,N,K), (6) Animation timing is natural (~1.5-2 seconds for words), (7) Both Front View and Side View heads animate in sync, (8) All 10 sprite sheets load correctly (front_sheet_0-4.jpg, side_sheet_0-4.jpg)

letter_practice_page.details: Page loads correctly with alphabet grid (A-Z), vowels highlighted in gold (A,E,I,O,U), animated heads display Front View and Side View

play_sound_button.details: Button triggers animation on Letter Practice page, animation plays and returns to neutral

animation_frames.details: Frame counter (F) changes during animation - observed F5 -> F13 -> F5 for letter 'A', F5 -> F193 -> F197 -> F45 -> F227 -> F223 -> F53 -> F5 for 'hello'

animation_completion.details: Animation completes and returns to neutral state (F5), does not loop

digraph_handling.details: Digraphs correctly treated as single phonemes: 'hello' shows H,E,LL,O (4 phonemes); 'ship' shows SH,I,P (3 phonemes); 'think' shows TH,I,N,K (4 phonemes)

animation_timing.details: Word animation completes in ~1.5-2 seconds at 0.5x speed, which is natural timing

dual_view_sync.details: Both Front View and Side View heads display and animate together

sprite_sheets.details: All 10 sprite sheets (front_sheet_0-4.jpg, side_sheet_0-4.jpg) load correctly with HTTP 200 status

mocked_features.camera_recording: MOCKED - Camera preview shows placeholder, recording functionality is simulated
mocked_features.microphone_recording: MOCKED - Audio recording is placeholder only
mocked_features.visual_audio_scoring: MOCKED - Scores are randomly generated (70-100 range)
